definition.text: The Data Tasks node controls all the data mining tasks defined for this Network Node.

paragraphs.text: You are about to start the first of the following activities that we'll cover in the next few minutes:
1. Run a data mining operation to get data for the BTC/USDT Market from Binance.
2. Run a Backtesting Session with an existing open-source strategy.
3. Run a Live Trading Session with minimal funds, to test the critical aspects of the system.
Are you cool with this? Shall we start?
